member.name: SICHINTF
member.summary: Used to determine how to compare two Shell items. uses this enumerated type.

member.name: SICHINTF.SICHINT_DISPLAY
member.summary: 0x00000000. This relates to the iOrder parameter of the interface and indicates that the comparison is based on the display in a folder view.

member.name: SICHINTF.SICHINT_ALLFIELDS
member.summary: (int)0x80000000. Exact comparison of two instances of a Shell item.

member.name: SICHINTF.SICHINT_CANONICAL
member.summary: 0x10000000. This relates to the iOrder parameter of the interface and indicates that the comparison is based on a canonical name.

member.name: SICHINTF.SICHINT_TEST_FILESYSPATH_IF_NOT_EQUAL
member.summary: 0x20000000. Windows 7 and later. If the Shell items are not the same, test the file system paths.
